originalText.text: Canalberry Pharmacy is my hidden gem in Chinatown! The kindness of the staff makes each visit a breeze, and their professionalism is top-notch. I'm always impressed by their knowledge; they guide me through options effortlessly. With an extensive range of medicines, it's a one-stop-shop for health essentials. Highly recommend for a personalized and friendly pharmacy experience!

text.text: Canalberry Pharmacy is my hidden gem in Chinatown! The kindness of the staff makes each visit a breeze, and their professionalism is top-notch. Highly recommend for a personalized and friendly pharmacy experience!

originalText.text: Good Pharmacy. The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. The service was efficient, and I appreciate the expertise and professionalism of the pharmacist, Michelle. Her knowledge and attention to detail were truly impressive. Michelle took the time to listen to my concerns and provided thorough explanations about my medication, ensuring that I left with a clear understanding of how to take it and what to expect. She genuinely cares about your well-being.

originalText.text: I love this pharmacy! It already distinguishes itself from other pharmacies. The staff at Canalberry goes above and beyond to provide individualized care, creating a welcoming atmosphere! The staff are so efficient and always have my prescriptions ready. If there’s any problems, they go above and beyond to contact me and my doctors and find the best resolution! The best pharmacy ever!

The best pharmacy ever!

originalText.text: I was at this store for the first time and I was greeted with warm welcomes. The people who works there are super friendly and welcoming. The pharmacist also explain the medication I take in great details. Overall I like the store and will get my med here from now on.

text.text: I was at this store for the first time and I was greeted with warm welcomes. The people who works there are super friendly and welcoming. The pharmacist also explain the medication I take in great details. Overall I like the store and will get my med here from now on.

originalText.text: Very informative pharmacist. she even called my doctor to make sure everything was good before she prescribed any medicine to me because it might mess with my blood pressure. Definitely my go to pharmacy from now on
